nodes.text: Zarrak's medallion was a powerful object that granted the user the ability to stun individuals and telekinetically move rocks. Zarrak, an Ewok user of dark magics on the forest moon of Endor was the only known user of this device, and he used it to attack his enemies. During a showdown with Ewoks from Bright Tree Village, Zarrak used his medallion to capture the Ewoks, Logray, Wicket Wystri Warrick, Latara, and Kneesaa a Jari Kintaka in prisons of stone. However, when the Ewok Teebo attacked Zarrak, he dropped the medallion which crumbled into pieces.
